name: MageRun
description:
What is MageRun?

MageRun is a fast paced action game. You have to stand still so that you can cast a spell but at the same time move to avoid enemy shots. Collect new spells and upgrades. Reskill your character for the respective situation and throw yourself back into battle. No story, just fun gameplay.

Grwoing Project

This project is subject to constant free content updates. With the updates come new modes, weapons, monsters, spells, equipment, levels and bosses.
The community wishes are taken into account and i will do my best to implement them into the game

What's next


Next comes the Land of Madness, in which you get a negative effect per level. If you survive 5 levels, you will be rewarded with a new staff for your mage.

Features


  • Fast arcade gameplay without a big grind
  • Currently over 20 spells
  • Currently over 10 different types of opponents
  • Project is provided with free content updates
  • No story, just fun gameplay
  • The community wishes are taken into account and i will do my best to implement them into the game
